sentence.Network_en: He believes in the ultimate perfectibility of man.

sentence.Network_en: The perfectibility of the definition about the infinitude in mathematics was analyzed firstly in this paper.

sentence.Network_en: In China, research and practice of CFO System has just started. It needs continuousconclusion and perfectibility.
